mapper.insert: insert into user (id, name, pw, phone, address1, address2, address3, email, article, date, pin, point, authority,isEnable) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, IFNULL(#{phone}, NULL) , IFNULL(#{address1}, NULL), IFNULL(#{address2}, NULL), IFNULL(#{address3}, NULL), IFNULL(#{email}, NULL), IFNULL(#{article}, 'N'), now(), NULL, 0, IFNULL(#{authority}, 'member'), IFNULL(#{isEnable}, 'N'))
mapper.update: UPDATE user set pw=#{password}, phone=#{phone}, address1=#{address1}, address2=#{address2}, address3=#{address3} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT * FROM user WHERE name=#{name} AND email=#{name}
SELECT * FROM user WHERE id=#{id} AND email=#{email} AND name=#{name}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE id=#{id} AND pw=#{password}
select authority FROM member where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update user set isEnable="Y" where id=#{id}
